intent_atoms.description: Implement parsing and validation for D3 tasks involving traf/tfhd/tfdt/trun to establish sample table scaffolding for fragment runs.
Integration coverage must be added for multi-fragment assets once suitable fixtures are available, exercising the D2 monotonic validation paths end-to-end.
Real-world fixtures for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H codecs must be acquired before synthetic payloads can be replaced and snapshot baselines refreshed due to licensing constraints.

functional_units.name: D3 Parsing and Validation
functional_units.description: Parses and validates traf/tfhd/tfdt/trun boxes to establish sample table scaffolding for fragment runs

functional_units.name: Integration Coverage for Multi-Fragment Assets
functional_units.description: Adds integration tests covering multi-fragment assets to exercise D2 monotonic validation paths end-to-end

functional_units.name: Real-World Fixture Acquisition
functional_units.description: Acquires real-world media fixtures for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4 and MPEG-H codecs to replace synthetic payloads and refresh snapshot baselines
